testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: When I click "All Content Types" in the "Current Class" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: And I click the Search button in the "All Content Types" column and verify the Search filters are visible inside column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: And I enter the Search phrase "*()" in the Search bar in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: Then verify the Search error message is visible in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: When I enter the Search phrase "helloWorld" in the Search bar in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: Then verify the Search error message is invisible in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search error message disappears after subsequent Searches
